per_frame_1=//per frame less reactive volume for all unused q vars, put before other q vars are set for cop out mashing
per_frame_2=vb = vb*0.95 + (1-vb)*pow(bass_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_3=vvb = vvb*0.95 + (1-vvb)*vb*0.01;
per_frame_4=vm = vm*0.95 + (1-vm)*pow(mid_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_5=vvm = vvm*0.95 + (1-vvm)*vm*0.01;
per_frame_6=vt = vt*0.95 + (1-vt)*pow(treb_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_7=vvt = vvt*0.95 + (1-vvt)*vt*0.01;
per_frame_8=vvb = min(1,max(0,vvb));
per_frame_9=vvm = min(1,max(0,vvm));
per_frame_10=vvt = min(1,max(0,vvt));
per_frame_11=q1   = (vvb+vvm+vvt)*10;
per_frame_12=q2   = (vvb+vvm+vvt)*10;
per_frame_13=q3   = (vvb+vvm+vvt)*10;
per_frame_14=q4   = (vvb+vvm+vvt)*10;

per_frame_42=q32  = (vvb+vvm+vvt)*10;
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=wave_r = 0.85 + 0.35*sin(0.437*time+1) + 0.55*sin(0.197*time+4);
per_frame_45=wave_g = 0.85 + 0.35*sin(0.544*time+2) + 0.55*sin(0.143*time+5);
per_frame_46=wave_b = 0.85 + 0.35*sin(0.751*time+3) + 0.55*sin(0.117*time+6);
per_frame_47=wave_r = sqrt(wave_r);
per_frame_48=wave_g = sqrt(wave_g);
per_frame_49=wave_b = sqrt(wave_b);
per_frame_50=rot = rot + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_51=cx = cx + 0.210*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_52=cy = cy + 0.210*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_53=dx = dx + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_54=dy = dy + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.284*time) + 0.40*sin(0.247*time) );
per_frame_55=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%6,0);
per_frame_56=dx = dx + dx_residual;
per_frame_57=dy = dy + dy_residual;
per_frame_58=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_59=dx_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2.13)*0.016*sin(time*7) + (1-equal(bass_thresh,2.13))*dx_residual;
per_frame_60=dy_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2.13)*0.012*sin(time*9) + (1-equal(bass_thresh,2.13))*dy_residual;
per_frame_61=wave_x = wave_x - dx_residual*7;
per_frame_62=wave_y = wave_y - dy_residual*7;
per_frame_63=wave_mystery = time*0.03;
per_frame_64=
per_frame_65=zoom = zoom + 0.008*(0.35*sin(0.844*time+2) + 0.55*sin(1.743*time+5));
per_frame_66=//zoom = zoom + max(0,treb-1.2)*0.1;
per_frame_67=
per_frame_68=q1 = 0.03;// + 0.09*pow( 0.5 + 0.25*sin(0.437*time+1) + 0.15*sin(0.197*time+4), 8 );
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_6=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*3;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`    // darken over time
warp_10=`    //ret -= 0.004;
warp_11=`    //ret *= 0.99;
warp_12=`    //ret *= 0.97 + 0.03*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_13=`    ret = frac(ret - 0.005);
warp_14=`}
warp_15=`
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x,
comp_5=`
comp_6=`ret = lerp (
comp_7=`GetBlur1(uv).x + GetBlur3(uv).x,
comp_8=`ret,
comp_9=`pow(ret,.5));
comp_10=`  
comp_11=`//  ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x - GetBlur1(uv).x;
comp_12=`    ret = pow(ret,float3(.5,1.2,8))*1.25 -.25;
comp_13=`    ret *= 1.0; //gamma
comp_14=` 
comp_15=`}
